entry.title: Awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
entry.content: Great app. Only one that actually has cool features you don't need to pay for!!! While there is some paid features, the vast majority is free, not just the basic or useless ones like in some other apps.

Awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Great app. Only one that actually has cool features you don't need to pay for!!! While there is some paid features, the vast majority is free, not just the basic or useless ones like in some other apps.
It's great. Obsessed

.

It's great. Obsessed

entry.title: Great App!
entry.content: The one thing I wish it consistently did was save pictures to my photos. Sometimes I have to find a location (then remember to go back and move the photos).

Great App!

The one thing I wish it consistently did was save pictures to my photos. Sometimes I have to find a location (then remember to go back and move the photos).

entry.title: Update requires you to pay for filters that were once free!
entry.content: I am not impressed with this update, it has more ads than ever , it's hard to navigate with all these other collage and boarder templates that are unnecessary, before I was able to use the food scene filter for free now I have to unlock it and pay! I am now looking for a new pic app

Update requires you to pay for filters that were once free!

I am not impressed with this update, it has more ads than ever , it's hard to navigate with all these other collage and boarder templates that are unnecessary, before I was able to use the food scene filter for free now I have to unlock it and pay! I am now looking for a new pic app

entry.title: Glitchy
entry.content: Love the editing tools, but making a collage is super glitchy. As soon as I try to adjust the width of the borders they all go to max width and there's no way to undo it. Switch is turned all the way down so there should be no border at all around pics but as soon as I even touch it it spazzes out.

Glitchy

Love the editing tools, but making a collage is super glitchy. As soon as I try to adjust the width of the borders they all go to max width and there's no way to undo it. Switch is turned all the way down so there should be no border at all around pics but as soon as I even touch it it spazzes out.

entry.title: Amazing app
entry.content: Long as I don't find any watermarks :P (although I wouldn't blame them if there is watermarks) this is a awesome app, and simple to use. Thank you! ^_^

entry.title: Amazing app
entry.content: I also lithely love this app so much. Has great pictures in the gallery for you to work with and you can also upload your own photos. I wish that the bold button was working for the font. Would make my text look a little better!

Amazing app

I also lithely love this app so much. Has great pictures in the gallery for you to work with and you can also upload your own photos. I wish that the bold button was working for the font. Would make my text look a little better!

entry.title: Bravo
entry.content: Très bonne app. Facile à utiliser et beaucoup de filtre. Les filtres se ressembles parfois. Beaucoup d'outils aussi et c'est gratuit.

Bravo

Très bonne app. Facile à utiliser et beaucoup de filtre. Les filtres se ressembles parfois. Beaucoup d'outils aussi et c'est gratuit.

entry.title: Wow!
entry.content: Cette application de photo est l'une des premières qui offrent autant de choix dans la modification de photos. Premièrement parce que déjà, sans avoir acheté la version complète avec tous les packs, nous avons beaucoup de choix pour modifier nos photos. Le fait d'avoir autant de choix au départ, nous donne plus le choix d'acheter d'autre packs. Les modifications faites aux photos sont réalistes. Vraiment une belle application. Wow. Merci!

Wow!

Cette application de photo est l'une des premières qui offrent autant de choix dans la modification de photos. Premièrement parce que déjà, sans avoir acheté la version complète avec tous les packs, nous avons beaucoup de choix pour modifier nos photos. Le fait d'avoir autant de choix au départ, nous donne plus le choix d'acheter d'autre packs. Les modifications faites aux photos sont réalistes. Vraiment une belle application. Wow. Merci!

entry.title: Still crashing....
entry.content: Used to love this app but ever since the second last update it crashes every time I try to open it. Latest update didn't fix the problem, still crashing. Will be deleting this for good now.

Still crashing....

Used to love this app but ever since the second last update it crashes every time I try to open it. Latest update didn't fix the problem, still crashing. Will be deleting this for good now.

entry.title: Update messed up the whole thing
entry.content: I have always used this app whenever I am making tumblr collages if I am on mobile and I use it almost daily. Although I am still frustrated that it doesn't provide 10 boxes collage I still use it. But after the latest update, not only the app keeps crashing, although a lot of issues has been like the blurry photos but the app constantly freezes and it is very annoying. Please fix this as soon as possible.

Update messed up the whole thing

I have always used this app whenever I am making tumblr collages if I am on mobile and I use it almost daily. Although I am still frustrated that it doesn't provide 10 boxes collage I still use it. But after the latest update, not only the app keeps crashing, although a lot of issues has been like the blurry photos but the app constantly freezes and it is very annoying. Please fix this as soon as possible.

entry.title: Love it but there's a problem
entry.content: I absolutely love the app, but since the last update whenever I want to import pictures from my library all I see is white. If I touch somewhere a picture appears and I can modify it, but I never know wich picture will show up... I have tried deleting the app and redownloading it but nothing changes. I hope it gets fixed soon :(

Love it but there's a problem

I absolutely love the app, but since the last update whenever I want to import pictures from my library all I see is white. If I touch somewhere a picture appears and I can modify it, but I never know wich picture will show up... I have tried deleting the app and redownloading it but nothing changes. I hope it gets fixed soon :(

entry.title: Works great!
entry.content: I haven't tried any other collage app - haven't needed to. This one does the job. Standard templates are for 2-9 photos. Additional templates are available for a small fee.

Works great!

I haven't tried any other collage app - haven't needed to. This one does the job. Standard templates are for 2-9 photos. Additional templates are available for a small fee.
